title: WhatsApp for iOS working on polls feature to group chats
content:
While WhatsApp is tweaking its app with camera UI changes, global voice player function, and more, it seems the company is now planning its next big feature, the ability to create polls on group chats.

The post WhatsApp for iOS working on polls feature to group chats appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While WhatsApp is tweaking some functions, the company is also planning its next big feature, the ability to create polls on group chats.
